ForEach<T>(IEnumerable<T>, Action<T>)

Performs an action on all the items in an IEnumerable collection.

public static void ForEach<T>(this IEnumerable<T> collection, Action<T> action)

Parameters

The collection to iterate on.

GetCommonPrefix(IEnumerable<string>)

Returns the most common prefix of every string in this IEnumerable<T>

public static string GetCommonPrefix(this IEnumerable<string> collection)

Parameters

collection IEnumerable<string>

The string IEnumerable<T>

Returns

string

The most common prefix, or an empty string if no common prefix could be found.

Examples

"ab" == { "abc", "abd" }.GetCommonPrefix()

GetNext<T>(IEnumerable<T>, T)

Retrieves the item after a pivot from an IEnumerable<T>.

public static T GetNext<T>(this IEnumerable<T> collection, T pivot)

Parameters

collection IEnumerable<T>

The collection to iterate on.

pivot T

The pivot value.

Returns

T

The item in collection appearing after pivot, or null if no such item exists.

T

The type of the items stored in the collection.
